definition: a man in general (singly or collectively)
kjvTranslation: another, [idiom] (blood-) thirsty, certain, chap(-man); divers, fellow, [idiom] in the flower of their age, husband, (certain, mortal) man, people, person, servant, some ([idiom] of them), [phrase] stranger, those, [phrase] their trade. It is often unexpressed in the English versions, especially when used in apposition with another word. Compare H376 (אִישׁ).

translations.bg: мъж като цяло (поотделно или в колектив)
translations.da: en mand i almindelighed (enkeltvis eller kollektivt)
translations.de: ein Mann im Allgemeinen (einzeln oder kollektiv)
translations.es: un hombre en general (individual o colectivamente)
translations.fr: un homme en général (seul ou collectivement)
translations.id: seorang pria pada umumnya (secara sendiri-sendiri atau bersama-sama)
translations.it: un uomo in generale (singolarmente o collettivamente)
translations.nl: een man in het algemeen (afzonderlijk of collectief)
translations.pt: um homem em geral (individual ou coletivamente)
translations.ro: un bărbat în general (individual sau colectiv)
translations.ru: мужчина в целом (в отдельности или в совокупности)
translations.sv: en man i allmänhet (enskilt eller kollektivt)
translations.tr: genel olarak bir erkek (tek başına veya toplu olarak)
